name: Live Connexus
description:
We have offices in Austin, Texas, and provides a broad array of computing services with the small business in mind. We offer office computing consulting services and integrated solutions that are affordable, easy and quick to deploy.
Mission
Provide small businesses a complete collaboration and communication solution, that is affordable, flexible and scalable to different business needs.
Company Overview
Live Connexus is a company focused on providing Cloud Computing solutions for small & medium businesses. We are experts in technology and can offer you consulting services and tools that are affordable, easy and quick to deploy, with no software or hardware to install, and with the latest technology available on the market. Our experts can customize the tools you require, and will provide training and support at any time.
